edge: A wealthy socialite who as a child was traumatized by his parents' murder. Wayne secretly operates as the heroic vigilante Batman.
Christian Bale portrays Bruce Wayne, a character who assumes the superhero alter ego Batman in the movie.
Michael Caine depicts Alfred Pennyworth, a trusted butler and confidant of Bruce Wayne.
Heath Ledger played the role of The Joker, a notorious criminal mastermind and anarchist who aims to spread chaos and corruption in Gotham.
Gary Oldman essayed the character of James Gordon, a virtuous police officer who collaborates with Batman in battling crime in Gotham.
In the movie, Aaron Eckhart portrays Harvey Dent, a dedicated district attorney who transforms into the antagonist Two-Face.
Maggie Gyllenhaal played Rachel Dawes, a contender for the position of assistant district attorney and Christian Bale's childhood friend.
CEO of Wayne Enterprises who supplies technology and equipment for Batman's campaign
